title: Win64 : Mount broken since rclone-v1.38-096-g9fbff7bc-windows-amd64 version.
body:
From rclone-v1.38-096-g9fbff7bc-windows-amd64 and high versions, mount command exits with error.

```
d:\Soft\rclone-v1.35-windows-amd64\rclone-v1.38-096-g9fbff7bc-windows-amd64>rclone.exe mount Bol: s: -vv
2017/11/15 18:14:53 DEBUG : Using config file from "C:\\Users\\Dell\\.rclone.conf"
2017/11/15 18:14:53 DEBUG : rclone: Version "v1.38-096-g9fbff7bc" starting with parameters ["rclone.exe" "mount" "Bol:" "s:" "-vv"]
2017/11/15 18:14:53 DEBUG : pacer: Rate limited, sleeping for 1.167960419s (1 consecutive low level retries)
2017/11/15 18:14:53 DEBUG : pacer: low level retry 1/10 (error googleapi: Error 403: Rate Limit Exceeded, rateLimitExceeded)
2017/11/15 18:14:53 DEBUG : pacer: Rate limited, sleeping for 2.21224271s (2 consecutive low level retries)
2017/11/15 18:14:53 DEBUG : pacer: low level retry 2/10 (error googleapi: Error 403: Rate Limit Exceeded, rateLimitExceeded)
2017/11/15 18:14:55 DEBUG : pacer: Resetting sleep to minimum 10ms on success
2017/11/15 18:14:55 INFO  : Google drive root '': Modify window is 1ms
2017/11/15 18:14:55 Fatal error: Can not open: s:: open s:: The system can not find the specified path.
```

The same command with rclone-v1.38-095-g413faa99-windows-amd64 , or lower, version can mount the remote.

Edit : I have a suspect : https://github.com/ncw/rclone/commit/9fbff7bcabb0b649751bb283a56a462f3cae707d

Edit 2 : Tried adding a final slash, a not existing path and an existing path... all failed.
```
d:\Soft\rclone-v1.35-windows-amd64\rclone-v1.38-096-g9fbff7bc-windows-amd64>rclone.exe mount Bol: s:\ -vv
2017/11/15 18:26:38 DEBUG : Using config file from "C:\\Users\\Dell\\.rclone.conf"
2017/11/15 18:26:38 DEBUG : rclone: Version "v1.38-096-g9fbff7bc" starting with parameters ["rclone.exe" "mount" "Bol:" "s:\\" "-vv"]
2017/11/15 18:26:38 INFO  : Google drive root '': Modify window is 1ms
2017/11/15 18:26:38 Fatal error: Can not open: s:\: open s:\: The system can not find the specified path.

d:\Soft\rclone-v1.35-windows-amd64\rclone-v1.38-096-g9fbff7bc-windows-amd64>rclone.exe mount Bol: d:\soft\rclone-v1.35-windows-amd64\TestMount
2017/11/15 18:27:09 Fatal error: Can not open: d:\soft\rclone-v1.35-windows-amd64\TestMount: open d:\soft\rclone-v1.35-windows-amd64\TestMount: The system can not find the specified path.

d:\Soft\rclone-v1.35-windows-amd64\rclone-v1.38-096-g9fbff7bc-windows-amd64>rclone.exe mount Bol: d:\soft\rclone-v1.35-windows-amd64\TestMount
Cannot create WinFsp-FUSE file system: mount point in use.
2017/11/15 18:27:28 ERROR : Google drive root '': Mount failed
2017/11/15 18:27:28 Fatal error: failed to mount FUSE fs: mount stopped before calling Init: mount failed
```
I created d:\soft\rclone-v1.35-windows-amd64\TestMount between the two last test.
